content: cuff down sock with shadow wrap heel by lindsey gustafson materials w one skein of sock yarn approximately 400 yards w us 11⁄2 2 50mm 32-inch circular needle or preferred length or dpns you may choose to use a diperence size needle to achieve the gauge and fit you prefer w removable stitch markers w a tapestry needle for grafting and weaving in ends sizes pattern is written for small medium large circumference 8-9 9-10 10-11 to determine your sock size measure the circumference of your foot at the ball widest part of your foot socks should fit with 1-2 of negative ease sock size is not determined by length you will knit the required length for your foot *tip highlight the size you need throughout the pattern to avoid any confusion abbreviations / stitch glossary bor - beginning of round ssk slip slip knit co - cast on st s - stitch/stitches k - knit tks twin knit stitch k2tog - knit 2 stitches together tps twin purl stitch p purl trks triple knit stitch pm place marker trps triple purl stitch ssk slip 2 stitches knit wise one at a time then knit the 2 slipped stitches together through the back loop tks lift the right arm of the stitch from the row below place that needle onto the left needle and knit into it move that new stitch back onto the left needle with its twin turn work tps slip the purl stitch to the right needle lift the stitch from the row below and purl it move both twin purl stitches to the left needle turn work trks worked the same at the tks but adds another sibling stitch trps worked the same at the tps but adds another sibling stitch cu# down sock with shadow wrap heel lindsey gustafson - 2024 instructions cuff co 56 64 72 sts using the german twisted cast on being careful not to twist stitches join for working in the round place a marker to indicate bor *k2 p2* repeat around repeat10 times for a shortie sock or 20 times for a crew sock leg continue in stockinette until you ve reached your desired height for shortie socks i work 10 rounds for crew socks work 50-70 rounds placing a removeable stitch marker every 10 rounds shadow wrap short row heel knit across the front of your sock these stitches will remain on hold as we work the heel on the back needle s row 1 rs knit across to the last st on the needle tks that stitch slip your stitches back onto the left needle you will have two stitches coming from the mother stitch and turn your work row 2 ws purl across to the last st on the needle tps that stitch slip the twin stitches back onto the left needle you will have two stitches coming from the mother stitch and turn your work **knit to one stitch before the twin stitch tks turn purl
